Intro:
INTRODUCTION:
Board the Maximus Ship, and journey into an exciting world.
The Maximus will hit an iceberg but you will survive the shipwreck.
Swim to a nearby island where you have to rely on your navigation skills, strategy and survival instinct to survive and escape the island. 
The only way to escape the island and win the game is to explore the island, gather useful items, return to the beach, and build a raft.
Help:
Help Commands: 
	To navigate type : 'go [north, south, east, west]' 
	To grab items type: 'grab/pickup/take [item name]'
	To craft an item type: 'craft/build [item name]'
	To eat an item type: 'eat [item name]'
	To sleep to regain energy type: 'sleep'
	To escape with raft type: 'escape'
	To inspect an item type: 'inspect [item name]'
	To turn on/off music type: 'music [on/off]
	To turn sound effects on/off: 'sound/fx [on/off]'
	To adjust volume type: 'volume [up/down]'
StoryIntro: Welcome aboard %s. We are expecting to arrive in a few hours.%n%nA few hours later......%n%n%nCaptain: Attention Passengers! There is a bad storm a head of us. We can't turn the ship around%nCaptain: MAYDAY! MAYDAY! MAYDAY!%nShipwreck! You jump in the water and swim to the nearest land%n%n
Instructions: INSTRUCTIONS: Explore the island and find a way to escape! Type 'help' at anytime to see a list of available commands. You can 'quit' at anytime
StartGamePrompt:
Would you like to start the game? 
Enter: 
	'yes' - to start a new game
	'load' - to load an existing game
	'no' - to quit
>
NamePrompt: Captain : Welcome Aboard Ship Maximus! May I have your name:
BuildNotSuccessful: Raft build unsuccessful. You do not have the required items yet.
InvalidCraftingLocation: You are not in a crafting location
CantGrabItem: You need something else to grab that item
CantEscape: You cannot escape without a raft!
SolvedPuzzle: Congratulations! You solved the puzzle! Continue in your search
UnSolvedPuzzle: haha :) You are wrong! you will be stuck here for centuries!!
PuzzlePrompt: Solve this puzzle and escape. Fail and you'll be stuck here for a century!!!
NotEnoughDropStamina: You don't have enough stamina to drop the item
NotEnoughPickUpStamina: You don't have enough stamina to pick up that item
CantMove: You don't have enough stamina to move
NoSavedGame: Couldn't find the saved game. Starting a new game
PitFall: Oooops! You fell into a pit. You feel dizzy. You must rely on your wits and brains to escape this pit
PitFallEscape: You have been asleep for centuries! That is enough punishment. You can now leave this pit.
